verses.verse: וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become מִיָּמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> But it came to pass within a while after בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> in the time קְצִיר־ <S%H7105><s%> harvest חִטִּ֗ים <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וַיִּפְקֹ֨ד <S%H6485><s%> visited שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <S%H8123><s%> that Samson אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> his wife בִּגְדִ֣י <S%H1423><s%> A young עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> goat וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אָבֹ֥אָה <S%H935><s%> I will go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H802><s%> to my wife הֶחָ֑דְרָה <S%H2315><s%> into the chamber וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נְתָנ֥וֹ <S%H5414><s%> would not suffer אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> But her father לָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> him to go in

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָבִ֗יהָ <S%H1><s%> And her father אָמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> I verily אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> thought כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that שָׂנֹ֣א <S%H8130><s%> that thou hadst utterly שְׂנֵאתָ֔הּ <S%H8130><s%> hated וָאֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <S%H5414><s%> her therefore I gave לְמֵרֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H4828><s%> her to thy companion הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲחֹתָ֤הּ <S%H269><s%> sister הַקְּטַנָּה֙ <S%H6996><s%> [is] not her younger טוֹבָ֣ה <S%H2896><s%> fairer מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> than תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please לְךָ֖ תַּחְתֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H8478><s%> instead

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson נִקֵּ֥יתִי <S%H5352><s%> shall I be more blameless הַפַּ֖עַם <S%H6471><s%> concerning them Now מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> than the Philistines כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> though I do אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I עִמָּ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> them רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> them a displeasure

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson וַיִּלְכֹּ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> and caught שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שׁוּעָלִ֑ים <S%H7776><s%> foxes וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and took לַפִּדִ֗ים <S%H3940><s%> firebrands וַיֶּ֤פֶן <S%H6437><s%> and turned זָנָב֙ <S%H2180><s%> tail אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זָנָ֔ב <S%H2180><s%> to tail וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put לַפִּ֥יד <S%H3940><s%> firebrand אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> a בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> between two הַזְּנָב֖וֹת <S%H2180><s%> tails בַּתָּֽוֶךְ׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst

וַיַּבְעֶר־ <S%H1197><s%> And when he had set אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> on fire בַּלַּפִּידִ֔ים <S%H3940><s%> the brands וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> he let [them] go בְּקָמ֣וֹת <S%H7054><s%> into the standing corn פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיַּבְעֵ֛ר <S%H1197><s%> and burnt up מִגָּדִ֥ישׁ <S%H1430><s%> both the shocks וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> along קָמָ֖ה <S%H7054><s%> and also the standing corn וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> along כֶּ֥רֶם <S%H3754><s%> with the vineyards זָֽיִת׃ <S%H2132><s%> [and] olives

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> said פְלִשְׁתִּים֮ <S%H6430><s%> Then the Philistines מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> Who hath done זֹאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> this? And they answered שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> Samson חֲתַ֣ן <S%H2860><s%> the son in law הַתִּמְנִ֔י <S%H8554><s%> of the Timnite כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> because he had taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> and given לְמֵרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H4828><s%> her to his companion וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> came up פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> and burnt אוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> her and her father בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> unto them Though תַּעֲשׂ֖וּן <S%H6213><s%> ye have done כָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> this כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Since נִקַּ֥מְתִּי <S%H5358><s%> yet will I be avenged בָכֶ֖ם וְאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> of you and after אֶחְדָּֽל׃ <S%H2308><s%> that I will cease

וַיַּ֨ךְ <S%H5221><s%> And he smote אוֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> שׁ֛וֹק <S%H7785><s%> them hip עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H3409><s%> thigh מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> with a great וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and he went down וַיֵּ֔שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בִּסְעִ֖יף <S%H5585><s%> in the top סֶ֥לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock עֵיטָֽם׃ <S%H5862><s%> Etam ס

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> Then the Philistines וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וַיִּנָּטְשׁ֖וּ <S%H5203><s%> and spread בַּלֶּֽחִי׃ <S%H3896><s%> themselves in Lehi

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לָמָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> Why עֲלִיתֶ֣ם <S%H5927><s%> Why are ye come up עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> against us? And they answered לֶאֱס֤וֹר <S%H631><s%> To bind אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> Samson עָלִ֔ינוּ <S%H5927><s%> are we come up לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> to him עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> to him as he hath done לָֽנוּ׃

וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <S%H3381><s%> went שְׁלֹשֶׁת֩ <S%H7969><s%> Then three אֲלָפִ֨ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to סְעִיף֮ <S%H5585><s%> to the top סֶ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock עֵיטָם֒ <S%H5862><s%> Etam וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said לְשִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <S%H8123><s%> to Samson הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> Knowest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <S%H4910><s%> [are] rulers בָּ֙נוּ֙ פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> thou not that the Philistines וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> that עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> over us? what [is] this [that] thou hast done לָּ֑נוּ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto us? And he said לָהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> to them עָ֣שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> unto them As they did לִ֔י כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> unto me so have I done לָהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> And they said לוֹ֙ לֶאֱסָרְךָ֣ <S%H631><s%> to bind יָרַ֔דְנוּ <S%H3381><s%> unto him We are come down לְתִתְּךָ֖ <S%H5414><s%> thee that we may deliver בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> thee into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson הִשָּׁבְע֣וּ <S%H7650><s%> unto them Swear לִ֔י פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> you will not תִּפְגְּע֥וּן <S%H6293><s%> unto me that ye will not fall upon בִּ֖י אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> And they spake ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying לֹ֚א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָסֹ֤ר <S%H631><s%> No but we will bind נֶֽאֱסָרְךָ֙ <S%H631><s%> thee fast וּנְתַנּ֣וּךָ <S%H5414><s%> and deliver בְיָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> thee into their hand וְהָמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> but surely לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No נְמִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4191><s%> we will not kill וַיַּאַסְרֻ֗הוּ <S%H631><s%> thee And they bound בִּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> him with two עֲבֹתִ֣ים <S%H5688><s%> cords חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> new וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּהוּ <S%H5927><s%> and brought him up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַסָּֽלַע׃ <S%H5553><s%> from the rock

הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he בָ֣א <S%H935><s%> [And] when he came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לֶ֔חִי <S%H3896><s%> unto Lehi וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines הֵרִ֣יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> shouted לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7125><s%> against וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <S%H6743><s%> came mightily עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> him and the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתִּהְיֶ֨ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become הָעֲבֹתִ֜ים <S%H5688><s%> upon him and the cords אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were on זְרוֹעוֹתָ֗יו <S%H2220><s%> that [were] upon his arms כַּפִּשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6593><s%> became as flax אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> is בָּעֲר֣וּ <S%H1197><s%> that was burnt בָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וַיִּמַּ֥סּוּ <S%H4549><s%> loosed אֱסוּרָ֖יו <S%H612><s%> and his bands מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from יָדָֽיו׃ <S%H3027><s%> from off his hands

וַיִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> And he found לְחִֽי־ <S%H3895><s%> jawbone חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> of an ass טְרִיָּ֑ה <S%H2961><s%> a new וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> and put forth יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיִּקָּחֶ֔הָ <S%H3947><s%> and took וַיַּךְ־ <S%H5221><s%> it and slew בָּ֖הּ אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson בִּלְחִ֣י <S%H3895><s%> With the jawbone הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> of an ass חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2563><s%> clay חֲמֹרָתָ֑יִם <S%H2563><s%> clay בִּלְחִ֣י <S%H3895><s%> with the jaw הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> of an ass הִכֵּ֖יתִי <S%H5221><s%> have I slain אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלֹּת֣וֹ <S%H3615><s%> And it came to pass when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> of speaking וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <S%H7993><s%> that he cast away הַלְּחִ֖י <S%H3895><s%> the jawbone מִיָּד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> and called לַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he רָ֥מַת לֶֽחִי׃ <S%H7437><s%> Ramathlehi
